reading/viewing: GitHub lessons ([Jenny Bryan](https://beta.rstudioconnect.com/jennybc/happy-git-with-r/); [GitHub with GitHub desktop](https://jcszamosi.github.io/mcmaster_swc_git_gui/); [GitHub on the command line](https://swcarpentry.github.io/git-novice/)); Software Carpentry lessons on [dplyr](http://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/13-dplyr/) and [tidyr](http://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/14-tidyr/); John Rauser on ["How Humans See Data"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fSgEeI2Xpdc)

topic: aggregation and smoothing for graphical display
